AIPResponse.description: An AIP describes an AIP retrieved by the storage service. (default view)

AIPResponseCollection.description: list_location_aips_response_body is the result type for an array of AIPResponse (default view)

identifier.description: Optional Batch identifier assigned by the user

keys.description: Key of the SIPs to ingest as part of the batch

source_id.description: Identifier of SIP source -- CURRENTLY NOT USED

check.description: If check is true, check user authorization to cancel deletion but don't execute the cancellation.

location_uuid.description: Identifier of the AIP's storage location

EnduroIngestBatch.description: Batch describes an ingest batch type.

sips_count.description: Number of SIPs in the Batch

uploader_email.description: Email of the user who uploaded the Batch

uploader_name.description: Name of the user who uploaded the Batch

uploader_uuid.description: UUID of the user who uploaded the Batch

EnduroIngestSip.description: SIP describes an ingest SIP type.

failed_as.description: Package type in case of failure (SIP or PIP)

failed_key.description: Object key of the failed package in the internal bucket

uploader_email.description: Email of the user who uploaded the SIP

uploader_name.description: Name of the user who uploaded the SIP

uploader_uuid.description: UUID of the user who uploaded the SIP

EnduroIngestSipTask.description: SIPTask describes a SIP workflow task.

EnduroIngestSipWorkflow.description: SIPWorkflow describes a workflow of a SIP.

EnduroIngestSipWorkflows.description: SIPWorkflows describes the workflows of a SIP.

EnduroIngestSipsourceObject.description: SIPSourceObject describes an object in a SIP source location.

is_dir.description: True if the object is a directory, false if it is a file

mod_time.description: Last modification time of the object

size.description: Size of the object in bytes

next.description: Token to get the next page of objects

created_at.description: Creation date & time of the user

EnduroPage.description: Page represents a subset of search results.

offset.description: Offset from first result to start of page

EnduroStorageAip.description: An AIP describes an AIP retrieved by the storage service.

EnduroStorageAipTask.description: AIPTask describes an AIP workflow task.

EnduroStorageAipWorkflow.description: AIPWorkflow describes a workflow of an AIP.

EnduroStorageAipWorkflows.description: AIPWorkflows describes the workflows of an AIP.

EnduroStorageLocation.description: A Location describes a location retrieved by the storage service.

fault.description: Is the error a server-side fault?

id.description: ID is a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

message.description: Message is a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

name.description: Name is the name of this class of errors.

LocationResponse.description: A Location describes a location retrieved by the storage service. (default view)

LocationResponseCollection.description: list_locations_response_body is the result type for an array of LocationResponse (default view)

jwt_header_Authorization.description: Secures endpoint by requiring a valid JWT token.
